attributes.action: stop putting people in jail which we have to keep.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: instead of jailing people make them work in the community,litter picking,motorway verge grass cutting,military assisting,graffiti removal,drain cleaning,street sweeping,the list is endless.it will save taxpeyers a fortune.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
